name: .XBMML File Extension
summary: Learn about .XBMML files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File saved in the XBMML format and opened by Braille Music Reader, a music creation tool for visually impaired persons; contains a braille musical score including score settings, such as notes, pitch, and octaves; holds metadata related to the score for indexing purposes.

content: To open a BMML file in Braille Music Reader, select File → Import → Xbmml, navigate to your file, and click Open.
NOTE: The XBMML extension is similar to the .BMML file extension but has the metadata storage capability.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
